titles.title: Crown Him With Many Crowns (Matthew Bridges)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him with many crowns, The Lamb upon His throne. Hear how the heavenly anthem drowns All music but His own. Awake my soul, and sing, Of Jesus’ victory And hail Him as our matchless King Through all eternity.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him the Lord of death; Behold His hands and side — Rich wounds that pour forth cleansing blood To make us glorified. No angels in the sky Can fully know that sight, But downward bend their wondering eyes At mysteries so bright.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Crown Him the Lord of heaven, One with the Father now. One with the Spirit through Him given, Oneness does us allow. To You be endless worth, Who made worlds, skies, and seas. Be now the Lord of heaven and earth And endless galaxies.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Far, far above our thought Your counsel does appear, When in Your time the works complete That caused our needless fear. We trust Your sovereign will To choose and to command. With wonder filled we stand amazed; We trust Your faithful hand.{/lang-eng}
